title: What’s Happening in Space Policy Feb 18-24, 2024
summary: Here is SpacePolicyOnline.com’s list of space policy events for the week of February 18-24, 2024 and any insight we can offer about them.  The House and Senate are in recess […]

title: Electron launches Astroscale inspection satellite
summary: A Rocket Lab Electron launched an Astroscale spacecraft that will rendezvous with and inspect a spent upper stage in low Earth orbit as a precursor to removing it.

title: AI company developing software to detect hypersonic missiles from space
summary: EpiSci won a $1.6 million SBIR contract from the Space Development Agency

title: Space Force to study Cape Canaveral launch sites for Starship
summary: The U.S. Space Force is preparing to kick off environmental studies that could lead to SpaceX Starship launches from either the Cape Canaveral facility used by the Delta 4 or a new complex.

title: India launches INSAT-3DS meteorological satellite with GSLV rocket
summary: India successfully launched the new generation INSAT-3DS meteorological satellite early Saturday.
